LITURGY.Comment: No Divine Liturgy UNLESS Finding or 40 Martyrs

SAINT.Name: Tuesday of the Second Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: We cannot hymn Thee as is meet, but we ask as we pray: destroy us not with our iniquities, O Lord Who art ready to do good things.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O Lord, I have loved the beauty of Thy house
and the place where Thy glory dwelleth.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Judge me, O Lord, for in mine innocence have I walked.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 3rd Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: The Lord is my light and my savior;
SEXTE.STICHOS: The Lord is the defender of my life; of whom then shall I be afraid?
